Text:

@Mauro_dv You're not the only one, I have the exact same problem.
Do Please SEEEED !! This sucks
@Mauro_dv Disable Internet before starting the game
@BadLuckBrian Thanks, but it didn't work.. There is a problem with the executable. It runs "MaxPayne3.exe" in the background but the game itself never starts..

yes very True What Mauro_dv Said.

Process Is Running In the Background But the game Never Launches
iono I'd wait for Reloaded crack, when I downloaded it NOd32 picked up a virus I know it might be a false positive but still I'd wait Reloaded is more trusted.

I could play the game by re-applying the 1.0.0.28 Reloaded crack and disconecting the internet at the moment of running the game. That way the launcher wont ask you to update the game and you'll be able to hit "play offline"
not work !

NEWS FLASH noobies: the patch works. Wanna get spoon-fed to get the info.? It's because RELOADED didn't even bother uploading another working patch if this were really working.

If you could just install all the previous updates from RELOADED, which on top of that WORKS, you can stop complaining shit about something that you doubt trusting with.

How did you even beat the game in the first place?  I guess you just play on easy mode. There. SATISFIED???
after i install this and opened it it ask me to make a club account. want next help please.do i make it on not i dont wont to be band.
Worked fine for me. Thanks

@EatShiit, you need a club account to play even Single Player. Make the account online at the Social Club website. I haven't tried going onto Multiplayer but some say it is possible. Maybe I'll try after completing the missions.

As there seem to be some confusing or conflicting statements here, just to clarify: I currently have the RELOADED 1.0.0.28 patch running.  Will this update and crack work well that, or is it better to wait for RELOADED's 1.0.0.29 release (assuming that they will do so)?  Thanks to anyone who can help us all.

@DeAnima, I personally downloaded the, Max Payne 3 - Multi - 10, .iso's. After installing I used RELOADED original crack & update that was uploaded 6-1-12. After that I used RELOADED for the 1.0.0.28 update. Now I used this THETA update and crack and it still works fine. Copy everything that is going to be overwritten before applying the crack just to be safe. That's what I did. You can also always just disconnect from the internet and play in 'offline mode' without updating.
Thanks very much jaysten, works perfectly!
When i i'm logged in RSC, and then Max Payne 3 is stopped working..can you please help me?
whatever i do , the game doesn't go past the launcher..... i just get a black screen .... pls helppp!!!!!

works fine on my MULTI retail dvd install with mostly reloaded updates plus this theta update. as with a lot of games these days, i had to actively block the relevant executables -- namely maxpayne.exe and renderer.exe -- in zonealarm before it would run properly. something about not going in and denying permission just throws the programs into some kind of limbo where they sit there doing nothing. but actively block them and it's good to go.
i can't get passed the social club account activation. I've copied and pasted "profiles" into the "social club" folder but it hasn't worked. it's asking me for an activation code. any ideas?
i had v28 working, installed this with crack, and the game loads and it ask for registration, even with no internet, crack does not work at least for me, back to v28
This looks suspicious, to say the least hmm
i guess it is fake, just woke up after letting in dl last night. i use on jtag, and xbox image browser says "unable to determine disc type"
